title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte! This highly pigmented eyeshadow stick comes in a light taupe-pink shade that is perfect for all occasions. Its matte finish gives a sophisticated look that lasts all day, thanks to its waterproof and crease-proof formula.

With key ingredients like Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow not only beautifies but also provides antioxidant protection and improves skin tone and texture. Suitable for even the most delicate sensitive skin, this eyeshadow stick glides on smoothly and effortlessly, no application tool required.

Complete with a built-in smudger for easy blending, this eyeshadow stick is a must-have for any makeup lover. Simply sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, blend with your fingers or the included smudger, and watch as your eyes pop with color. Get your hands on the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte and elevate your makeup game today!

Formulated with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow not only beautifies but also nourishes your delicate sensitive skin. The built-in smudger makes application a breeze, no brush required!

Choose from a variety of shades including Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic to create your desired look.
